name: Hide N’ Seek 2
description:
Welcome to the sequel of Hide N’ Seek!

Explore a bigger map, more characters, random generation, new colliders and realistic asset colliders.

A new map feature! Find out where you are on the map.

New timer! Find out how long you can hide on hide mode!

On normal mode, click a character to add your points up. Collect them all to win!

And there’s more! Download today for free!
